content: this pattern is written for knitting with trios or the magic loop method the back of the socks including the heel is knitted on the first needle while the back of the leg is knitted in chart a pattern the sole is knitted in stockinette stitch the front of the socks is knitted in chart b pattern on the second needle the pattern includes two heel options a boomerang heel with german short row construction without intersections and a classic heel with flap & gusset and a normal toe which can be easily substituted with your favorite heel or toe the different sizes are highlighted in different colors for german speaking knitters i attached an extra pdf with stitch translation that should make it easy for you even if you don t speak english für deutsch sprachige stricker/-innen habe ich ein extra pdf zur anleitung mit angehangen welches die strickstiche ins deutsche übersetzt somit sollte es auch für diejenigen einfach sein das muster zu stricken welche kein englisch sprechen
